mixin size

Description

Mixin to give size to elements

Scope

Public

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
width width number —
height height number $width

Signature

@mixin size ($width, $height: $width) { ... }

mixin position

Description

Can be called but it's not the point
Documentation: http://hugogiraudel.com/2013/08/05/offsets-sass-mixin/

Scope

private

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
position position string —
args list of offsets and values list —

Signature

@mixin position ($position, $args) { ... }

mixin absolute

Description

Mixin triplet calling the private mixin
with the appropriate position value Documentation: http://hugogiraudel.com/2014/05/19/new-offsets-sass-mixin/

Scope

Public

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
args list of offsets and values list —

Signature

@mixin absolute ($args) { ... }

mixin triangle

Description

Mixin handling CSS triangles

Scope

Public

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
direction arrow direction string —
color arrow color color currentColor
position arrow position list —
size arrow size number 1em

Signature

@mixin triangle ($direction, $color: currentColor, $position, $size: 1em) { ... }

mixin prefixer

Description

Mixin to prefix properties that are not prefixed by Compass
@param $property : property to prefix @param $value : value to use

Scope

Public
